title.narrative: West Africa Competitiveness and Quality Infrastructure Project

description.narrative: UNIDO Competitiveness and Quality Infrastructure Programme for West Africa: Strengthening industrial competitiveness of the West African priority countries through value chain development and an enhanced level of production, transformation and export capacities of the private sector (to be implemented under the framework of the 11th European Development Fund West Africa.Competitiveness Programme). Description: In order to allow a more strategic positioning of UNIDO within the framework of the 11th EDF (European Development Fund) West Africa Competitiveness Programme, the following PA is expected to: - Undertake formulation and outreach missions to the priority countries which will be crucial in identifying the most beneficial value chains with growth and youth employment potential; - Draft individual project documents for each of the countries, including the viable data collected during the formulation missions; - Raise awareness of relevant national counterparts and EU delegations about UNIDO#s mandate and its interventions at national and regional levels. - Enable a donor/partnership friendly environment for the resource mobilization necessary for the future project implementation Overall, the individual projects, which are to be developed, will seek to increase competitiveness through enhanced productivit
